title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/munglers_bola.html
notes:
"Mrs Bola" includes a few items:
 - a photo of a woman, dressed up, sitting on a wicker chair. This may be a personal pic the Lad stole and we leave it out.
- a really lame "certificate" - here it is:

LAME "CERTIFICATE"

THIS IS TO CERTIFY THAT ON THIS DAY 20TH  OF APRIL 2003  MR MARK JOHNSON MADE A DEPOSIT  WITH STALLION FINANCE / SECURITY COMPANY LOME_TOGO AS STATED BELOW.

OCCUPATION:         BUSINESS                           .                                            .. 
NATURE OF DEPOSIT:TWO METALIC IRON BOXES ON TRANSFER    .

CONTENT :UN-REFINED GOLD DUST                           .                                                                                                          

TOTAL WEIGHT OF CONSIGNMENT:150 KILOGRAM                . .

DATE OF DEPOSIT:      20TH  APRIL  2003                   .                                             .

TIME OF DEPOSIT :        10 HOURS  G.M.T                  .


STANLEY  WILLIAMS.                      MR  MARK  JOHNSON.

Director of operation.                                                          Depositor.  

Sign................                                                                      Sign.. M.JOHNSON                                                   



 SOCIETE ANONYME AU CAPITAL SOCIAL DE 1.250 MILLIONS DE FCFA

messages.body:
Dear
  I am a top civil servant in a governmental
agency
responsible for social services. I am priviledged
to
classified files.
In 2001, a contract was awarded by my government
to
a joint German/Finnish engineering firm for urban
roads rehabilitation and construction. The actual
contract worth was $101million.
The contract was successfully executed. The firm
has
been paid and they have since packed up their
construction rigs and left the country. 
However the contracted was overestimated by
$49million, and this sum my collegues and I are
desirous to move out of ther country.
I was making discreet enquiries here during a
diplomatic gathering and a member of your
diplomatic
staff  gave me your email address and advised I
contact you.
Please let me know if you are willing to assist.
You
will be well compensated.
I wait to hear favourably from you.
Best regards
  Mrs,Bola
messages.raw:
Mrs Bola

Dear
I am a top civil servant in a governmental agency responsible for social services. I am priviledged to classified files.
In 2001, a contract was awarded by my government to a joint German/Finnish engineering firm for urban roads rehabilitation and construction. The actual contract worth was $101million.
The contract was successfully executed. The firm has been paid and they have since packed up their construction rigs and left the country.
However the contracted was overestimated by $49million, and this sum my collegues and I are desirous to move out of ther country. I was making discreet enquiries here during a diplomatic gathering and a member of your diplomatic staff gave me your email address and advised I contact you.
Please let me know if you are willing to assist.
You will be well compensated.
I wait to hear favourably from you.
Best regards
Mrs,Bola

messages.body:
Madam

What is this nonsense? What "diplomatic staff" are
you
talking about? All my staff are mechanics, and
useless
ones at that. Which one of them has been posing as a
diplomat? Give me his name. He must be punished.

Meanwhile, what are you talking about? Do you
require
help with something?

Speak!
Phil
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Sat, 1 Apr 2006

Madam

What is this nonsense? What "diplomatic staff" are you talking about? All my staff are mechanics, and useless ones at that. Which one of them has been posing as a diplomat? Give me his name. He must be punished.

Meanwhile, what are you talking about? Do you require help with something?

Speak! Phil

messages.body:
My dear,
Thanks for your mail. I will be very much happy to
conclude the business with you, sofar you will be
capable of handling it without any problem.This is
not a jock sir

First, I will need your company name and address,
together with your direct telephone and fax number.
As soon as i have it, i will immediately go to the
cooperate affairs commission here to register your
compan y as one of the contractors that did the
contract some years back, so with that, we will then
apply to the finance house for the release of the
fund to us. Note that at the end of the transaction,
you will take 25% of the total sum, 65% for me and
my partner here while 10% will be for any expences
that we might incure during the process od
actualising this goal.

  I will also want us to go into a partnership
agreement that will bind everyone of us in this
business, so i will need the below information from
you to enable me prepare the partnership agreement.

  1.YOUR FULL NAME.
   2.YOUR COMPANY NAME
  3.YOUR DIRECT CONTACT ADDRESS.
  4.YOUR OCCUPATION
  5.YOUR DIRECT TEL/FAX NUMBER FOR EASY
COMMUNICATION.

  As soon as i have the above information, i will
expadite action for onward registration of your
company here.

  Awaiting.

  Mrs Bola






INDEED NOT_ LET US
HOPE MRS EBOLA CAN GET THINGS MOVING IN THE RIGHT
DIRECTION FOR A CHANGE -- 

S



But then there is a bit of silence. Finally:
messages.raw:
Mrs Bola

Date: Wed, 5 Apr 2006

My dear,
Thanks for your mail. I will be very much happy to conclude the business with you, sofar you will be capable of handling it without any problem.This is not a jock sir

First, I will need your company name and address, together with your direct telephone and fax number. As soon as i have it, i will immediately go to the cooperate affairs commission here to register your compan y as one of the contractors that did the contract some years back, so with that, we will then apply to the finance house for the release of the fund to us. Note that at the end of the transaction, you will take 25% of the total sum, 65% for me and my partner here while 10% will be for any expences that we might incure during the process od actualising this goal.

I will also want us to go into a partnership agreement that will bind everyone of us in this business, so i will need the below information from you to enable me prepare the partnership agreement.

1.YOUR FULL NAME.
2.YOUR COMPANY NAME
3.YOUR DIRECT CONTACT ADDRESS.
4.YOUR OCCUPATION
5.YOUR DIRECT TEL/FAX NUMBER FOR EASY COMMUNICATION.

As soon as i have the above information, i will expadite action for onward registration of your company here.

Awaiting.

Mrs Bola



How can I ignore someone who says "This is not a jock sir"?

INDEED NOT_ LET US HOPE MRS EBOLA CAN GET THINGS MOVING IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION FOR A CHANGE -- S


But then there is a bit of silence. Finally:

messages.body:
Dear Phil,

  Thank you for your email message and your concern
in this matter.

  Actually, none of your mechanics has been poising
as a diplomat.

  My message was directed to you and I was hoping
that you are in a position to assist me with the
receipt of the aforementioned amount of 
  49 M USD which was a surplus amount paid to some
contractors who executed certain contracts with our
government and has since collected their contract
payment. The surplus amount was due to an over
invoicing carried out by our office with a view to
disbursing this huge amount with a capable and
trustworthy foreigner who can present or stand for
claim.

  We shall handle every issue here, you are only
required to present a viable and low tax company
bank account into which this funds will be
transfered into.

  We have all the necessary details and informations
including the backing of our accountant who will
effect payment immediately upon your providing a
proforma invoice claiming the above payment. We
shall furnish you with a format or copy of materials
which you will list in your proforma invoice to be
used to present for the claim.

  Note that in the eyes of our government, this
payment is considered to be already approved for
payment and hence, there is no need for you to worry
everything will be done in a legal manner and will
be above board.

  I am looking forward to your urgent response
accordingly.

  Best regards

  Mrs. Bola
messages.raw:
Mrs Bola

Dear Phil,

Thank you for your email message and your concern in this matter.

Actually, none of your mechanics has been poising as a diplomat.

My message was directed to you and I was hoping that you are in a position to assist me with the receipt of the aforementioned amount of 49 M USD which was a surplus amount paid to some contractors who executed certain contracts with our government and has since collected their contract payment. The surplus amount was due to an over invoicing carried out by our office with a view to disbursing this huge amount with a capable and trustworthy foreigner who can present or stand for claim.

We shall handle every issue here, you are only required to present a viable and low tax company bank account into which this funds will be transfered into.

We have all the necessary details and informations including the backing of our accountant who will effect payment immediately upon your providing a proforma invoice claiming the above payment. We shall furnish you with a format or copy of materials which you will list in your proforma invoice to be used to present for the claim.

Note that in the eyes of our government, this payment is considered to be already approved for payment and hence, there is no need for you to worry everything will be done in a legal manner and will be above board.

I am looking forward to your urgent response accordingly.

Best regards

Mrs. Bola

messages.body:
Ms Bola

Thank you for your email at last. I was beginning to
think you had lost interest in this once in a lifetime
opportunity.

I am pleased to hear that none of my mechanics were
pretending to be diplomats. They have as much decorum
between them as a muslim cartoon protest.

That being the case, where did you get my name from?

I would like to know this before we progress.

Remain blessed,
Phil




Mikhail Stroganov: 
VERY AMUSING PHIL IF I MAY SAY_MAY YOUR CUSTARD BE
CREAMY

S

Phil Munglers

messages.body:
Dear Phil,

  Thank you for your email response and your
question.

  I got your name over the internet, while sourcing
for a reputable individual or company to do business
with.

  As regards to my last email, I would like you to
furnish a detailed response so that we know how to
proceed accordingly.

  Regards

  Mrs. Bola

messages.body:
Dear Phil,

  Excuse my late response to your email. I received
your full name, address and contact phone number.

  In a summary, we shall require the name of your
company or organisation if you have one. We shall
submit this information (your company name) to our
Foreign payment office, which will be used to raise
an application for payment of the mentioned funds in
your favour.

  Several important documents and payment approvals
will be secured in respect of this transfer and we
shall require your full banking informations, where
this amount can be transfered into.

  I will use this oppurtunity to inform you that, my
assistant Mr. Martins Abednego, who is fully aware
of this deal will be corresponding and communicating
with you further as regrads this transaction. This
is because he will be the person who will undertake
the documentation and arrangements for the transfer
in your favour.

  He will contact you by telephone, by tomorrow
morning your time.

  You can also feel free to contact him on
+228-9248971. He is fully informed on all details of
the deal and you should consider him a partner in
this deal, just like me.

  If you have any need to contact me, do not
hesitate to do so.

  Regards

  Mrs. Bola
messages.raw:
Mrs Bola

Dear Phil,

Excuse my late response to your email. I received your full name, address and contact phone number.

In a summary, we shall require the name of your company or organisation if you have one. We shall submit this information (your company name) to our Foreign payment office, which will be used to raise an application for payment of the mentioned funds in your favour.

Several important documents and payment approvals will be secured in respect of this transfer and we shall require your full banking informations, where this amount can be transfered into.

I will use this oppurtunity to inform you that, my assistant Mr. Martins Abednego, who is fully aware of this deal will be corresponding and communicating with you further as regrads this transaction. This is because he will be the person who will undertake the documentation and arrangements for the transfer in your favour.

He will contact you by telephone, by tomorrow morning your time.

You can also feel free to contact him on +228-9248971. He is fully informed on all details of the deal and you should consider him a partner in this deal, just like me.

If you have any need to contact me, do not hesitate to do so.

Regards

Mrs. Bola

messages.body:
Mrs Bolax

Thank you for your reply.

You ask for my company name. While I do have my own
racing team, Go Munglers!, they are not really an
"official" company. The Japanese government is not
aware of the existence of Go Munglers! which helps me
when it comes to paying tax and whatnot - I simply do
not bother.

From here on it sounds like things are going to get
rather more involved on the legal side of things. That
being the case I will need to bring in my own
representative, Mikhail Stroganov. He is a trusted
friend and also acts as my lawyer, accountant,
biographer, and occasional car washer when he is in
Japan.

As for your man, Mr. Martins Abednego, I'm afraid I
will not be able to speak to him on the phone unless
he is fluent in Japanese. I cannot speak English, I am
merely able to read and write the language. Hopefully
this won't be too much of a pain. Please send me this
dude's email address and I'll begin modalities with
him.

Mikhail's email address is
mikhailstroganov@yahoo.co.uk just in case you feel
like writing and introducing yourself.

Thanks,
Phil
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Mrs Bolax

You ask for my company name. While I do have my own racing team, Go Munglers!, they are not really an "official" company. The Japanese government is not aware of the existence of Go Munglers! which helps me when it comes to paying tax and whatnot - I simply do not bother.

From here on it sounds like things are going to get rather more involved on the legal side of things. That being the case I will need to bring in my own representative, Mikhail Stroganov. He is a trusted friend and also acts as my lawyer, accountant, biographer, and occasional car washer when he is in Japan.

As for your man, Mr. Martins Abednego, I'm afraid I will not be able to speak to him on the phone unless he is fluent in Japanese. I cannot speak English, I am merely able to read and write the language. Hopefully this won't be too much of a pain. Please send me this dude's email address and I'll begin modalities with him.

Mikhail's email address is mikhailstroganov@yahoo.co.uk just in case you feel like writing and introducing yourself.

Thanks,
Phil

messages.body:
Dear Mikhail,

  We where asked to contact you in respect of a
particular transaction involving Philipp Munglers.

  We are sorry to take up any of your time. We have
decided in the interest of certain principles of
humanity decided to abandon this transaction with
you and Philip.

  We have been retired involuntarily and on a very
short notice. 

  Do not contact us again.

  Regards
messages.raw:
Mrs Bola

We where asked to contact you in respect of a particular transaction involving Philipp Munglers.

We are sorry to take up any of your time. We have decided in the interest of certain principles of humanity decided to abandon this transaction with you and Philip.

We have been retired involuntarily and on a very short notice.

Do not contact us again.

Regards

messages.body:
What is this fresh nonsense?

Ms Bola I DEMAND an explanation for this twaddle. What
do you mean you must abandon this transaction? Who
says so? You cannot just jump-ship in mid modalities,
this is an agreement.

Justify this latest crap at once.

Phil

messages.body:
My dear,
Thanks for the information. First thing on wednesday morning, i will submit your information to our cooperate affairs commission here for onward registration of your company as a sub contractor that did the contract some years back. Note that as soon as the registration certificate is out, we will use it to secure an approval from the ministry of finance for onward release of the fund to any of your account overseas.
 
Please, note that i have done my homework here very well so as soon as the approval is out on your favour, the management will invite you to come down for the final signings , but if you cannot be able to fly down here, then i will use my position to lift the fund to Amsterdam(Holland), where you can be able to fly down for the final signings/collection of the payment.
 
Below is the partnership agreement , so you should go through it , sign and send back to me for indorsement.
God bless,
 
Madam Bola
 
                           
 
                                     PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT.
I, Madam Bola Adibayo of BP:224 Atakpame , Lome Togo, Hereafter referred to as owner ,and Mr .............of.............referred to as partner(Receiver), which _expression shall, where the context so admits, include his being representative or assignee on the one part, witness as follows:
 
(A)That the subject matter of this agreement is the recovery of contract fund(USD49M) in account number: 14-25520044/Ecob, deposited with Eco bank, Lome Togo.
 
(B)That both parties have agreed under the condition listed below to the sharing of the fund upon receipt in the account nominated by my partner (Mr .........................)
 
(1) That USD2.5M will be for my partner(receiving party, 10% for incidental expanses while the rest money will be for me(Owner) and my partner.
 
(C)That the issuing party shall extend part of his share of the money into gainful business in any country of his choice with a high degree of anonymity.
 
D)That any expenses incurred by both parties in the process of securing the approval, remittance and the receipt of the fund in the account of the partner Mr ........................., shall be deducted from the 10% set aside for incidental expenses before sharing the proceeds.
 
 E)That the partner has promised and agreed not to hide any information away from the owner, party, before and after the receipt of the fund in his bank account.
 
F)That this agreement shall be valid upon mutual signature and until the above referred conditions have been fulfilled respectively and legally.
 
G)That the receiving party (Mr.Phillip Bakamusha) is helping the issuing party (MRS ROSE GUEI) to receive USD49M into an account devised and established for the safekeeping for the issuing party for the purposes of investment.
 
This agreement is governed by the law of Republic of Togo, and that the receiving party promised to protect the interest of the issuing party.
 
As witnesses the hands and seals of the partners firstly above written. The agreement will become effective the date of the signing by both parties.
 
Mrs Rose Guei(Owner).  Signed..................Date................
 
Witness:...................     Sign:....................Date.................
 
Partner: Phillip Bakamusha . Sign :................Date:.............
 
Witness..................            Date.................

messages.body:
Ms Bollax, I'm not sure what most of this agreement
meant, but that is what you get with legal guff, is it
not? Note, I may have my own agreement for you to
sign. Just a formality, nothing to worry about.

What expenses are you expecting to encounter by the
way? I notice you have set aside 10% of the 49million
for such a thing. What the hell are we going to need
nearly 5million dollars for? How can we possibly run
up such an outrageous list of expenses?

If I manage to get my agreement to you, after you have
completed and returned it, I will send you a gift of
consumer garbage. I am Japanese, brilliant, and rich
after all. Have a think about what you may like, a tub
of fish ice cream perhaps, some schoolgirl panties, a
metal gear (or any other kind of gear/ frame/ mech),
or maybe just a simple laptop or phone or something
equally boring.

Hai!!
Phil


I forgot the goddamn form. See attached.

(with his corrections):

PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT.
I, MadamBola Adibayoof BP:224 Atakpame , Lome Togo, Hereafter referred to as owner ,and Mr ..MUNGLERS...........of...JAPAN..........referred to as partner(Receiver), which __expression shall, where the context so admits, include his being representative or assignee on the one part, witness as follows: 

(A)That the subject matter of this agreement is the recovery of contract fund(USD49M) in account number: 14-25520044/Ecob, deposited with Eco bank, Lome Togo.

(B)That both parties have agreed under the condition listed below to the sharing of the fund upon receipt in the account nominated by my partner (Mr ..MUNGLERS......)

(1) That USD2.5M will be for my partner(receiving party, 10% for incidental expanses while the rest money will be for me(Owner) and my partner. 

(C)That the issuing party shall extend part of his share of the money into gainful business in any country of his choice with a high degree of anonymity.

D)That any expenses incurred by both parties in the process of securing the approval, remittance and the receipt of the fund in the account of the partner Mr ...MUNGLERS for gods sake.., shall be deducted from the 10% set aside for incidental expenses before sharing the proceeds.

E)That the partner has promised and agreed not to hide any information away from the owner, party, before and after the receipt of the fund in his bank account.

F)That this agreement shall be valid upon mutual signature and until the above referred conditions have been fulfilled respectively and legally.

G)That the receiving party (Mr.Phillip MUNGLERS!!) is helping the issuing party (MRS ROSE GUEI) to receive USD49M into an account devised and established for the safekeeping for the issuing party for the purposes of investment.

This agreement is governed by the law of Republic of Togo, and that the receiving party promised to protect the interest of the issuing party.

As witnesses the hands and seals of the partners firstly above written. The agreement will become effective the date of the signing by both parties. 

Mrs Rose Guei(Owner). Signed..................Date................ 

Witness:................... Sign:....................Date................. 

Partner:Phillip MUNGLERS!! .Sign :.Phil....Date:..04/11/2006.

Witness..I DO.... Date..04/11/2006...
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Ms Bollax, I'm not sure what most of this agreement meant, but that is what you get with legal guff, is it not? Note, I may have my own agreement for you to sign. Just a formality, nothing to worry about.

What expenses are you expecting to encounter by the way? I notice you have set aside 10% of the 49million for such a thing. What the hell are we going to need nearly 5million dollars for? How can we possibly run up such an outrageous list of expenses?

If I manage to get my agreement to you, after you have completed and returned it, I will send you a gift of consumer garbage. I am Japanese, brilliant, and rich after all. Have a think about what you may like, a tub of fish ice cream perhaps, some schoolgirl panties, a metal gear (or any other kind of gear/ frame/ mech), or maybe just a simple laptop or phone or something equally boring.

Hai!!
Phil

messages.body:
April 12

Dear BOLA
 
I'm afraid I do not have a passport. I will have to send you my drivers license instead. But first, as Mikhail has suggested, I will need some proof from yourself about the claim.
 
Please send me whatever documents you have relating to this. Failing that, a decent picture of yourself with your car. The picture must be good quality.
 
Have you had a thought about what gift you would like from me? Soon, hopefully, I will have my own contract for you to sign.
 
Reply immediately.
Phil

messages.body:
My Dear  Phil Munglers.

  You know the reason why i have not really specify
things to you all this while was because i have been
praying to God to reveal to me if  i am
communicating with the right person i can in-trust
this fund in his care and custody,

  My Phil I don't know how you may be looking at the
whole thing, it has not been easy for me,  indeed
this is an opportunity but so confidential that i
must succeed  the transfer only with a foreigner, 
You can bear with me how possible it can be to
in-trust this huge amount of money to some one you
don't know neither have i got any communication with
you before apart from this.  But i want to let you
know that by my prayers,  I am convinced to go ahead
and trust you in this transaction and to let you
know every thing about the fund and where it is kept
as now and the process of transferring it to your
care, after that, then i have to come over to your
Country.

  When this money was mapped out for payment from
Our department in the ministry, And the Construction
Company has left the Country I packed this money in
a metallic iron box and cover it with a little
quantity of unrefined gold dust and deposited it in
a Security Company here as unrefined gold dust
on-transfer, as the dealers usually deposit it
ontrasnfer to abroad for refined.

  And it has been there since 2003 when it was
deposited and we have been seeking on how to get a
honest foreigner we can in-trust the transfer to his
custody.  The attachment files are My personal
picture  and The deposit Certificate of the fund.

  Now i will like us to go into the real business, 
Bellow is an application of claim and transfer which
you have to fill correctly and send it to the
Security Company through fax or e-mail address of
the Security company immediately please so that they
will commence the process of the transfer
immediately.

  Best regards  as i expect your urgent reply
please.

  Mrs Bola.

  please for your information,  I deposited it in
this name Mr Mark Johnson, So please use the name in
comunicating with the Security company, but fill in
the application form your addresses as what matters
is the neccessary ducuments of the deposit which all
is intact with me in-case they demand.

  THIS IS THE APPLICATION FORM YOU HAVE TO FILL AND
SEND TO THE SECURITY COMPANY.


  ATTN/
  MR. STANLEY  WILLIAMS  ( DIRECTOR  OF OPERATION)

  STALLION SECURITY / FINANCE COMPANY 
B.P 33, LOME TOGO.
FAX: (228) 250 - 0447,TELEPHONE: +228-928-2923
  EMAIL; stallion_sfctwa@yahoo.com

APPLICATION FOR CLAIM AND TRANSFER OF  CONSIGNMENT
CODE NUMBER. / A7805201368.

OF STALLION FINANCE / SECURITY COMPANY, 
  THAT I WILL LIKE THE MANAGEMENT OF STALLION
FINANCE / SECURITY COMPANY TO RELEASE AND TRANSFER
MY DEPOSITED CONSIGNMENT ON-TRANSFER,  OF TWO
METALLIC IRON BOXES CONTAINING UNREFINED GOLD DUST .


NAME:..MARK  JOHNSON.

ADDRESS: ......................

EMAIL:....

ADDRESS........................................................



  PHONE NUM:................................FAX
NUMB.........................

   PLEASE DO ACCEPT MY LATE APPLICATION AS THIS WAS
DUE TO SOME BUSINESS LOGISTICS PROBLEM THAT OCCURED
AFTER MY BUSINESS TRIP TO AFRICA IN 2003.
PLEASE TREAT AS A MATTER OF URGENT

 THANKS,

messages.body:
April 12

Ms Bollax

You have confused me. You said that you had $49Million
that was left over when some Finnish/ German company
had overestimated on their budget, then you had me
fill in some wanky form to reclaim it for you.

Now you have sent me ANOTHER form to fill in,
demanding the release of gold dust!? What is this
nonsense? And what is this picture of you? I said take
the picture with your CAR, not sitting on a wicker
basket.

And you still haven't told me what gift you want from
Japan!

Until you answer my questions and explain this guff,
then I will not entertain your form-filling obsession
for one more minute.

Phil

Now you have sent me ANOTHER form to fill in, demanding the release of gold dust!? What is this nonsense? And what is this picture of you? I said take the picture with your CAR, not sitting on a wicker basket.

And you still haven't told me what gift you want from Japan!

Until you answer my questions and explain this guff, then I will not entertain your form-filling obsession for one more minute.

Phil

messages.body:
I apologize for my absence. That damn idiot Takumi
crashed my 350Z and ended up in hospital. This meant I
had to test drive my own goddamn cars this weekend and
was incommunicado. I haven't even had time to fire him
yet, but that may not be so easy as he is a partner in
my company. If I had an gram more ruthlessness in me I
would have him chopped up in his bed for wrecking my
favorite car.

Now then. Where are we up to? Mikhail - has Ms
Bollocks been in contact? Or the lawyer? Please let me
know.

Phil
